reviews.review: The more i play it the more i love it. The game has issues but the core gameplay loop and the really interesting way each killer is designed and how different each game can play out always keeps me coming back. I would pick it up on a sale since the game can be pretty expensive due to all the dlc but there are some workarounds in game to some dlc walls. Give it a shot!!
They've done a pretty good job so far.
Nada a dizer. SÃ³ recomendo ğŸ‘
Really Fun game to play with friends or alone like me.

Honestly this game gettin' worse and worse year by year. Nowdays 'the lobby' means like 20 minutes of waiting for some lobby. If you play with a friend, normally ur mate find lobby without u even u start with him. Developers rather creating trash skins AF than fix the bugs. Sure, it's my favourite game but this company getting mad year by year. 

The hitbox's ? This game don't have thiese. It's a common that the killer hit u like for 5 meters far away from u.
I can't recommend this game if you don't have powerfull nervous system in ur body, cause u will get upset every match u play. 



Sadly this game is so broken but anyway I play it every day. I'm retarded too

Bye

Es muy Divertido Jugar con amigos, pero solo llega un momento en que te aburres bastante. Asi que mejor Piensalo antes de comprar bro. Ademas

I genuinely suggest this game for anyone who wants to have fun with a horror-themed game, whilst also playing along with other people. 
It's fun most of the time, especially the first many hours you play. Perks and items as well as new teammates and killers make the game variate every time. 

The downside to the game is the fact that a lot of the killers, survivors & their perks are locked behind a paywall. Not everyone has enough money to spare, and that means that you can miss out on your favorite characters.

It can get a little repetitive, but all in all a great game to play with or without your friends.
finde das game gut und wenn man den afterchat ausschaltet muss man sich auch nicht die beleidigungen von ein paar halbstarken anhÃ¶ren die nur im netz ne groÃŸe klappe haben

Whoever has balanced the game's scoring system so that if we get the generators done quickly and escape without being hooked much and THAT RESULTS IN A TERRIBLE SCORE should do a better job of explaining to me what the goal of the game is,

because if the goal of the game is to purposely encounter and get attacked/hooked by the killer, then I must have misunderstood something in the tutorial...

Fun to play with friends as survivor but also a good solo game when playing killer.
Lots of in depth mechanics and competitive as well as casual friendly.

Simulator of a hike for vodka in Russia at 3 am.
Just as scary and dangerous.
8 bottles of vodka at 3 am out of 10

This is the real fun game.
Must try.
